title: The ABC of It
creator_credit: Stafford Garner, Brian Adams and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: An impressionistic look at the many aspects of the Australian Broadcasting Commission, showing film crews on location and in the studio; collation and broadcasting of daily news; events; ethnic radio; orchestral performances; sporting events coverage; and rating surveys.
description: An impressionistic look at the many aspects of the Australian Broadcasting Commission, showing film crews on location and in the studio; collation and broadcasting of daily news; events; ethnic radio; orchestral performances; sporting events coverage; and rating surveys.
